title: Challenges and Insights amidst the Covid-19 pandemic: Nutrition, the immune system and disease risk.
text: Challenges and Insights amidst the Covid-19 pandemic: Nutrition, the immune system and disease risk.
Curr Opin Clin Nutr Metab Care
journal: Curr Opin Clin Nutr Metab Care

similar.title: COVID-19: Risk Groups, Mechanistic Insights, and Challenges.
text: COVID-19: Risk Groups, Mechanistic Insights, and Challenges.

As Dr. Thomson eloquently notes in his valuable letter [1], underlying respiratory diseases appear to be less of a risk factor for poor outcome in COVID-19 patients than either underlying cardiovascular disease or diabetes. This intriguing finding emerged from several studies that examined underlying medical conditions in COVID-19 patients.
abstract: As Dr. Thomson eloquently notes in his valuable letter [1], underlying respiratory diseases appear to be less of a risk factor for poor outcome in COVID-19 patients than either underlying cardiovascular disease or diabetes. This intriguing finding emerged from several studies that examined underlying medical conditions in COVID-19 patients.
